Initializes a new instance of the error message with a default message indicating that the owner is invalid

<Note>
  `InvalidOwnerError` extends `BaseError`, see the docs for BaseError for all
  supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { InvalidOwnerError } from "@alchemy/smart-accounts";
```

## Parameters

### reason

`string`
the reason the owner is invalid
